name: Introduction to Media Studies
description: This course provides an introduction to the field of Media Studies, looking at the history, theories, and methods of the field.

name: Introduction to Public Relations
description: This course provides a foundational introduction to the field of Public Relations, exploring the history, theories, and methods of the field.

name: Public Relations Writing
description: This course focuses on honing writing skills for public relations professionals. Topics include drafting press releases, crafting speeches, creating marketing materials, and more.

name: Public Relations Ethics and Law
description: This course focuses on the ethical and legal considerations in public relations. Topics include understanding regulations, developing ethical decision-making skills, and more.

name: Public Relations Campaigns and Strategies
description: This course focuses on the practical applications of public relations. Topics include creating campaigns, utilizing multiple platforms, and more.
